title: Stitched SS316 thermal conductivity curve (NIST cryogenic + Alleima high-temperature datasheet)
license_notes: Derived curve built from cited public sources. Verify original source terms before redistributing full source content.
page_or_table: NIST k(T) fit sampled on 4-293.15 K + Alleima thermal conductivity table from 100 C to 600 C

metadata.stitch_note: High-temperature branch is anchored at T=293.15 K to the NIST endpoint for continuity.
